analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavatyai ārya mārīcī devatāyai

original: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma /
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyām viharati sma

original: jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhatrayodaśabhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca mahāśrāvakabodhisatvamahāsatvaiḥ /
analyzed: jetavane nāthapiṇḍadasya ārāme mahatā bhikṣu saṃghena sārdha trayodaśa bhikṣu śataiḥ saṃbahulaiḥ ca mahāśrāvaka bodhisatva mahāsatvaiḥ

original: tatra khalu bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
analyzed: tatra khalu bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma

original: asti bhikṣavo mārīcī nāma devatā sā sūryacandramāsoḥ purato 'nūpagacchati /
analyzed: asti bhikṣavaḥ mārīcī nāma devatā sā sūrya candramāsoḥ puratas nu upagacchati

original: sā na dṛśyate na gṛhyate na badhyate na nirudhyate na virudhyate na muṣyate na muhyate na daṇḍyate na muṇḍyate na dahyate na śatror anūpagacchati
analyzed: sā na dṛśyate na gṛhyate na badhyate na nirudhyate na virudhyate na muṣyate na muhyate na daṇḍyate na muṇḍyate na dahyate na śatroḥ anūpagacchati

original: yo 'pi tasya bhikṣavo mārīcīnāmadevatāyā nāma jānāti so 'pi na dṛśyate na gṛhyate
analyzed: yaḥ pi tasya bhikṣavaḥ mārīcī nāmadevatāyāḥ nāma jānāti saḥ pi na dṛśyate na gṛhyate

original: na badhyate na nirudhyate na virudhyate na muṣyate na muhyate na daṇḍyate na muṇḍyate
analyzed: na badhyate na nirudhyate na virudhyate na muṣyate na muhyate na daṇḍyate na muṇḍyate
saḥ ham bhikṣavaḥ mārīcī nāmadevatāyāḥ nāma jānāmi

original: aham api @ayam api@@ na dṛśyate na badhyate na nirudhyate na virudhyate na muhyate na daṇḍyate na muṇḍyate na dahyate na śatror anūpagacchati
analyzed: aham api ayam api na dṛśyate na badhyate na nirudhyate na virudhyate na muhyate na daṇḍyate na muṇḍyate na dahyate na śatroḥ anūpagacchati

original: tadyathā ḥ oṃ padākramasi parākramasi udayamasi nairamasi arkamasi markamasi urmasi vanamasi gulmamasi cīvaramasi mahācīvaramasi antardhānamasi  #
analyzed: tat yathā ḥ om padākramasi parākramasi udayam asi nairam asi arkam asi markam asi urmasi vanam asi gulmam asi cīvaram asi mahācīvaram asi antardhānam asi
om mārīcī devatā pathe mām gopaya
mā adh agni bhayatas mām gopaya
sarva pratyarthika pratyamitra bhayataḥ mām gopaya
rakṣa mama sarva satvānām ca sarva duṣṭa praduṣṭebhyaḥ

original: tadyathā ḥ namo ratnatrayāya oṃ ālo tālo kālo sacchalo satvamudrati rakṣa rakṣa māṃ saparivārasya sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ svāhā
analyzed: tat yathā ḥ namaḥ ratnatrayāya om ālo tālo kālo sacchalo satvamudrati rakṣa rakṣa mām sa parivārasya sarva satvānām ca sarva bhaya upadravebhyaḥ svāhā

original: tadyathā ḥ oṃ vattālī vadālī varālī varāhamukhī /
analyzed: tat yathā ḥ om vattālī vadālī varālī varāhamukhī
sarva duṣṭa praduṣṭānām cakṣuḥ mukham bandha bandha

original: bandha mukhaṃ jambhaya stambhaya mohaya svāhā /
analyzed: bandha mukham jambhaya stambhaya mohaya svāhā

original: oṃ varālī vadālī vattālī varāhamukhī sarvaduṣṭapraduṣṭānāṃ cakṣurmukhaṃ bandha bandha
analyzed: om varālī vadālī vattālī varāhamukhī sarva duṣṭa praduṣṭānām cakṣuḥ mukham bandha bandha

original: jambhaya jambhaya stambhaya stambhaya mohaya mohaya bhañjaya bhañjaya tarjaya tarjaya
analyzed: jambhaya jambhaya stambhaya stambhaya mohaya mohaya bhañjaya bhañjaya tarjaya tarjaya

original: hrīṃ hrīṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ* svāhā /
analyzed: hrīṃ hrīṃ hūm hūm phaṭ svāhā

original: oṃ mārīcyai sara sara muhya muhya vimuhya vimuhya apakrāmya apakrāmya sarvaduṣṭasatvān pathe utpathe sarvavidhnavināyakā apasarantu mā tiṣṭhantu  #
analyzed: om mārīcyai sara sara muhya muhya vimuhya vimuhya apakrāmya apakrāmya sarva duṣṭa satvān pathe utpathe sarva vidhna vināyakāḥ apasarantu mā tiṣṭhantu

original: oṃ agali pagali pañcagali sarvaduṣṭapraduṣṭānāṃ kāyavākcittaṃ mukhaṃ cakṣuṣi bandha bandha hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ* phaṭ* phaṭ* svāhā /
analyzed: om agali pagali pañcagali sarva duṣṭa praduṣṭānām kāya vāc cittam mukham cakṣuṣi bandha bandha hūm hūm hūm phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisatvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato  #
analyzed: idam avocat bhagavān ātta manāḥ te ca bhikṣavaḥ te ca bodhisatvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad sa deva mānuṣa asura garuḍa gandharvaḥ ca lokaḥ bhagavataḥ
